Articles.Content:
Heyo

 

I have recently started using the EVA Enhancements mod - and I am in love. It's making finding research locations during EVA so much easier - its delightful.

 

However, I've been thinking: Are there any mods that augment the EVA jetpacks? Perhaps tied in with some science?

Like, something that makes EVA jetpack stronger - make the EVA suit more impact resistant - something to slow down 'tumbles' when you fall down hills or hit the ground at too high horizontal speed

 

Is there anything like that around or being made?
KIS will give you, among other great features, extra EVA fuel.
The Pathfinder or Buffalo mods have added a winged back pack with drop tanks and carrying attachments. I haven't used it yet but it looks interesting.
